meanings.definition: The action of describing or portraying something precisely.
meanings.sent1: Her delineation of the character's emotions was clear and accurate.
meanings.sent2: The delineation of the map helped us understand the geography better.
meanings.sent3: The artist's delineation of the cat wearing a hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: In his speech, he used the delineation of a mountain to symbolize overcoming challenges.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's delineation of the scientific process made it easy to remember.

meanings.definition: The act of outlining or marking the boundaries of something.
meanings.sent1: The delineation of the property lines prevented any disputes.
meanings.sent2: The delineation of the parking spaces made it easier for drivers to park.
meanings.sent3: The delineation of the cake slices at the party was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The delineation of responsibilities in the group project ensured everyone knew their tasks.
meanings.sent5: The delineation of the garden beds helped keep the plants organized.

meanings.definition: A representation or depiction of something in detail.
meanings.sent1: The artist's delineation of the city skyline was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The delineation of the historical event in the textbook was informative.
meanings.sent3: The delineation of the alien spaceship in the movie was surprisingly realistic.
meanings.sent4: Her delineation of the family portrait captured each member's personality perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The delineation of the intricate design on the vase was impressive.
